article.name: KnowBe4 Academy Change Log
article.title: KnowBe4 Academy Change Log
article.body:
Use this article to stay up-to-date with changes to the KnowBe4 Academy.

Note:Changes may include new, updated, deprecated, or removed features. KnowBe4 reserves the right to terminate access to, use of, and support of features that are included as part of the Subscription Services, which is common with SaaS services as they are constantly changing and improving. This allows us to adapt to the evolving cybersecurity industry so we can provide current, high-quality services.

See the table below for a list of updates, with the latest updates displayed at the top.

Release Date Description
November 2025
  • November 24, 2024 - Completing courses on the KnowBe4 Academy now counts as credit for the Security Awareness and Cultural Professional™ (SACP™) Continuing Professional Education (CPE) recertification. For more information, see the Security Awareness and Culture Professional (SACP) Certification Handbook from H Layer Credentialing.
  • November 24, 2025 - We’ve added a new Risk Score course! Now, you can learn how to analyze and apply Risk Score for your organization.
October 2025
  • October 21, 2025 - We’ve added a new SecurityCoach course! Now, you can learn how to use and integrate our SecurityCoach product.
  • October 20, 2025 - We’ve retired our KSAT 101 course and replaced it with a new and improved Security Awareness Training collection. This new collection features the same KSAT 101 content and a brand new Learner Experience (LX) module.
April 2025
  • April 7, 2025 - We’ve launched the KnowBe4 Academy! Now, you can learn how to use and integrate KnowBe4’s products successfully. The following modules are now available:
  • PhishER 101
  • KSAT 101
  • Free Tools 101
  • KnowBe4 101

For more information, see our KnowBe4 Academy Guide.
